doc.field: How to download a photo from FLICKR: 1. Click on the photo you wish to download; 2. On the end right-side of the page you will see 3 dots, this is an "Action" button. Click on the option "view all sizes"; 3. Select which size you wish to download. If you intend to print the photo to paper, then "Original" is typically the best option; 4. Finally, select the "Download" button. The Botequim is an event occuring on Porto Bay Rio Internacional every thursday from 19h00 to 23h00. Come and experience the typical buffet of boteco snacks to the sound of a well tuned samba trio, enjoying a refreshing Caipirinha* *free Caipirinhaone per person More details on <a target"_blank" href"http:www.portobay.comhotelArea.aspx?areaId96" rel"nofollow">www.portobay.comhotelArea.aspx?areaId96<a>
